ModMetaData.name: Patch Collar Malinois
ModMetaData.author: Annabelesca
ModMetaData.description:
You want your Malinois seem less threatening? Or will you put on shield collar and send it to fight the assaulters? Well, now you can! This mod adds four types of collars for Malinois. The dog bow, the leather dog collar, the studded dog collar, and the shield dog collar.
Credits to Shenanigans for let me use part of his code and textures of the mod "Dog Collars" Please let me know any issue in the comments
